answers.answer: 47 weeks? Wow. she's big! I havent experienced this but my aunt was told her baby was 9 pounds and she went on a c-section and she was 6.5 pounds. So they could be wrong.
Do you by chance have gestation diabetes?  My mom had to very induced a month early with my sister because she had it. She was 11lb 1oz!!

Yeah they could be but for the past 3 months I started measuring extreme big. They did an extensive ultrasound again a few weeks back& showed she is big and extra fluid. I can tell she is huge bc she is taking up my hole belly. Kicking me in the ribsa nd punching me  in the cervix. The last ultrasound said estimated dd Dec 26 & I'm not due till Jan 11! They will not change the due date. I had both my other kids 19 days earlier so I'm praying Iget through November an anytime in Dec she will arrive.
Yes everything normal with blood work!
oh sry no GD blood work normal.

question: Anyone else ever measured this big with one baby? Extra fluid & big baby girl. This is my 3rd baby and never had this with my other two kiddos. I go for monthly ultrasound bc she is already 5 pds! I start weekly stress test next week. Just wondering if anyone else has been through this and how long did u carry b4 u went into labor. Thx
title: 32 Weeks Measuring @ 47 weeks
